wikipedia_page.main: Avis Willington (born 12 August 1956) is a British former swimmer. Willington competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics.She also represented England and won a bronze medal in the 4 x 100 metres freestyle relay event, at the 1974 British Commonwealth Games in Christchurch, New Zealand.
